snippet: When the Texas Legislature convened this month, improving the state’s water infrastructure was one of the most frequently discussed topics.
abstract: Texas Legislature has bipartisan support for improving state's water infrastructure as population booms and devastating two-year drought drags on; Republicans, in unusual move, propose tapping emergency fund to finance building of new reservoirs and other projects in state's water plan.
lead_paragraph: When the Texas Legislature convened this month, improving the state’s water infrastructure was one of the most frequently discussed topics.

headline.seo: Texas Drought Pushes Lawmakers to Focus on Water in New Session
headline.main: As Texas Bakes in a Long Drought, Water Becomes a Focus for Legislators
